WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: The default username of the admin.

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The default email of the admin. This can be change later on the admin page.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The password of the admin. This can be change later on the admin page.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: The name of the host. eg. appname.herokuapp.com or can be multiple hosts by separating with comma. eg. domain.com,appname.herokuapp.com
